job_description:
Senior Full Stack Developer
HouR client, a fast-growth digital performance agency based in Toronto and known for its tech-forward approach, is seeking a highly skilled Senior Full Stack Developer.
We are looking for passionate coders, interested in joining a fun and professional team!
As a Senior Full Stack Developer, you will collaborate closely with Project Managers to understand client requirements for web or mobile projects. The ideal candidate should be a self-motivated individual with a passion for development and a strong understanding of front-end and back-end technologies.
You will be responsible for designing, developing, testing, and deploying software applications, working collaboratively with other teams and stakeholders to ensure project requirements are met, and innovative solutions are delivered.
This is a fast-paced environment where the ideal candidate must be comfortable handling multiple tasks simultaneously and possess a strong work ethic committed to achieving results.
Key Responsibilities & Duties
Collaborate with project managers, developers and senior architects to complete development projects.
Maintain a detail-oriented approach and demonstrate a thorough understanding of technical requirements.
Ensure all tasks and projects undergo comprehensive quality assurance checks for accuracy and completeness before being handed off.
Ensure that projects are completed within the designated timeline.
What We Are Looking For
Possess 3+ years of hands-on experience in NodeJS, NextJS, NestJS, React, Angular, or Express.
Demonstrate a solid understanding of TypeScript and JavaScript.
Knowledge of utilizing Azure and/or AWS, and/or GCP is essential.
Proficiency in Dev Containers (VSCode) and Docker is critical.
Possess a solid understanding of CMS platforms (such as WordPress, Kentico, Umbraco, Drupal, etc.), preferred.
Proficient with Git or a similar tool.
Experience with full-cycle development is necessary.
About You
Possess a strong work ethic, self-motivation, and a passion for learning and working with the latest technologies.
Be a team player who can adapt quickly to ever-changing environments.
Able to work collaboratively with teams and stakeholders to achieve project goals.
Must have excellent written and verbal communication skills and exceptional interpersonal skills.
Demonstrate adaptability, the ability to learn quickly, the tolerance for stress, and the ability to work under tight deadlines with minimal supervision.
Ability to manage multiple projects concurrently.
What's In It For You?
Join an inclusive, collaborative work environment that fosters creativity and curiosity and celebrates success!
Receive access to the latest tools and technology to create exceptional customer experiences.
Enjoy career advancement opportunities. Your talent is valued, and they want to see you succeed, not just in your current role but throughout your career.
Benefit from a competitive total rewards package that includes a base salary, performance bonuses, paid vacation, personal and sick days, paternity/maternity leave, and comprehensive medical, vision, and dental benefits.
After-work socials.

Location- Downtown Toronto
Hybrid- Toronto office, 3 days from office.
